name: Red Wine Letterpress print
description:
Crack open a bottle when all seams lost or had a bad day, it will all come good in the morning or you'll have a banging head and forget about your troubles!

Printed letterpress one at a time with antique wood type and on a vintage press. Each print has passed through the press 6 times to overlap each letter

Printed in red and grey ink on 320g off white flecked card.
Each print will be signed

This print will fit frames or mounts for A3 or 12"x16"
Paper size 29.7 x 42cm
Printed area 210 mm x 310mm (8.3" x 12.2") 

Your print will be packed in a sturdy cardboard tube and delivered in the UK by 1st class post. Via Airmail to other destinations.

©Print for the Love of Wood

name: Full Day Letterpress Workshop Voucher
description:
An introduction into the craft of letterpress.
Get inked up and ready to roll! Each student gets hands on learning how to hand-set and lock up type to pulling a print.
Printing takes place in our working print shop on a variety of vintage and antique printing presses including small hand operated platens to large flat bed proofing presses.

As well as basic letterpress tuition such as ink mixing, make ready and packing the press, students can learn modern computer to plate methods and file preparation for polymer or magnesium plates
This is the perfect class for someone thinking of buying a press or for those who have already bought one and don't know where to start!
Students are welcome to bring their press along so I can give it the once over and get it up and running.

All students will create their own personnel project from our large collection of wood and metal type to take home with them.

VOUCHERS
Our Vouchers have been created using hand-set wood and metal type and printed letterpress on beautiful Somerset cotton. They come tucked inside a kraft folder and envelope to make gift giving a joy and will be posted via 1st class
Vouchers are valid April - Oct 2014 and workshops will run either weekends or weekdays, dates yet to be confirmed.
Please note workshops only run when  the weather gets warmer and start generally after Easter.
For groups one off dates can be arranged

Our workshop is situated in the Lancashire market town of Great Harwood, an hours drive away from most major towns and cities such as Kendal, Manchester, Liverpool, Leeds and Harrogate.

7 hour workshop 10am - 5pm
Materials included
No experience required
Max 4 student per class
Min 2 students for classes to run
For more information contact Jacqui on
jacqui@printforloveofwood.com
or 07941653122

name: Half Day Letterpress Workshop Voucher
description:
Love letterpress and and want to get your hands inky?
Want to create your own piece of art with wood type or some personalised stationery or cards?
Our 3 hour hands-on basic introduction into the craft of letterpress lets you get creative without going to in depth into all the technical bits.
All students will create their own small personnel print project from our large collection of wood and metal type to take home with them.
Please note for people wanting to create a larger more complicated poster or project please book a full day workshop

Printing takes place in our working print shop on a variety of vintage and antique printing presses including small hand operated platens to large flat bed proofing presses.

VOUCHERS
Our Vouchers been created using hand-set wood and metal type and printed letterpress on beautiful Somerset cotton. They come tucked inside a kraft folder and envelope to make gift giving a joy and will be posted via 1st class
Vouchers are valid April - Oct 2014 and workshops will run either weekends or weekdays, dates yet to be confirmed.
Please note workshops only run when  the weather gets warmer and start generally after Easter.
For groups one off dates can be arranged

Our workshop is situated in the Lancashire market town of Great Harwood, an hours drive away from most major towns and cities such as Kendal, Manchester, Liverpool, Leeds and Harrogate.

3 hr workshop. Materials included
No experience required
Max 4 student per class
Min 2 students for classes to run
For more information contact Jacqui on
jacqui@printforloveofwood.com
or 07941653122

name: Personalised Wedding Letterpress Print
description:
Unique wedding gift for the happy couple
Personlised letterpress posters printed with old wood printing letters using traditional methods on a vintage press.
Approximate size 7” x 15”

The cost of this print includes the change of...
1. Initials
2. Last name
3. Date
LOVE ALWAYS & FOREVER stays the same
Please note the length of your words will determine the choice of wood font. So the finished result may vary from shown for the last name

Extra lines of text can be added changed for an extra charge of £10 per line
Please note this will make the print longer in length

Your print will come rolled in a large tube.
FREE POSTAGE to the UK. Via airmail everywhere else £2.00

Once you have paid I will send you a form to fill in with the details.
If you have any questions please drop Jacqui a line at
info[at]printforloveofwood.com

FREE POSTAGE to the UK. Via airmail everywhere else £2.00
